column1: APA Granite State Open Championships (Inmates & General Public Event)
December 17, 1989 - New Hampshire State Prison - Concord, New Hampshire
Best Lifters: Novice-Tim Barchard Open-Dave Miller
1st Place Team: Hard Nocks Gym of Amesbury, Massachusetts
2nd Plate Team: Jodia Gym of Bellows Falls, Vermont
1st Place Novice Team: New Hampshire State Prison Powerlifitng Team
Judges: Jayne Beattie, Rod Inman, Dave Inman, Scott Taylor, Mark Donnelly
This event was held at New Hampshire State Prison. Several lifters came from 4 states to compete agains the lifters of New Hampshire State Prison.
This event was featured in Powerlifitng USA magazine on page 72 of the February 1990 edition.
